text:
Madoka, good work.
──── What are you doing?

Haha, I see.
Guess you're taking a break.

Well, I might as well take a break too...
Alrighty then...

Huh, nothing in particular.
...Am I bothering you?
...That question. What kind of a reply are you expecting?

Haha...!
Yeah, I get it... My bad, Sorry.

The wind feels great...
It's like my heart's being refreshed......

Hustling everyday, you don't realize it but,
I think it's important to have time to relax like this.

But it's not like I'm treating this as a vacation though...!
I came up with the training menu, but──

You can continue playing 
ith the wind as much as you like.
